Class ProductInventory

  • java.lang.Object

  • public final class ProductInventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to create,save, and read an inventory of products.
    Author:
    Alejandro Moracen

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProductInventory

        public ProductInventory()
        Constructor for Customer to read All Inventory products. precondition none postcondition returns an ArrayList of Product if file is found. Else,ArrayList is empty

      • ProductInventory

        public ProductInventory(java.lang.String sellerName)
        Constructor for Seller inventory. Reads only the seller's inventory precondition none postcondition returns an ArrayList of Product if file is found. Else,ArrayList is empty
        Parameters:
        sellerName - a string
